title: Bloomberg Markets: Rothberg on Practicing Valuation Discipline
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rothberg on Practicing Valuation Discipline
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ira M Rothberg Portfolio Manager Hennessy Funds Discussing market outlook and investing in his Hennessy Focus Fund.
